snippet: Mr. Citron’s financial actions astounded bankers and bureaucrats, and put the county in bankruptcy in 1994, and himself in prison the following year.
abstract: Robert L Citron, former treasurer of Orange County, Calif, whose financial actions put county in bankruptcy and himself in prison, dies at age 87.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Citron’s financial actions astounded bankers and bureaucrats, and put the county in bankruptcy in 1994, and himself in prison the following year.

headline.seo: Robert Citron, Culprit in California Fraud, Dies at 87
headline.main: Robert Citron, Culprit in California Fraud, Dies at 87
headline.print_headline: Robert Citron, 87, Culprit in California Fraud
